title.rendered: ISES 2019 – Call for Papers for Research Demo Session (RDS)

content.rendered:
IEEE International Symposium on Smart Electronic Systems 2019 (IEEE-iSES, formerly IEEE-iNIS) invites authors to submit research demonstration proposals. In the Research Demo Session (RDS), authors can present live demonstrations and hardware prototypes of their research papers and projects. The research demo can be between 1-page (extended abstract) to a maximum of 4-pages (short paper) and must contain the following information: –

 

  1. Title, Authors and Affiliations
  2. Abstract
  3. Introduction and Motivation
  4. Proposed Design including experiment results
  5. Conclusions/References

 

The submission needs to be done using the online system. The submissions will be reviewed. The accepted ones will be published in proceedings in a separate track. The idea is: it is a paper, but the form of presentation is not oral, not poster, but demo. Best research demo award will be presented during the conference banquet. Award will be based on the quality of the research, demo and the presentation. For additional information contact: Chair of the Research Demo Session (RDS) from the list of the organizing committee.
